title: 10 Years of Kubernetes: Past, Present, and Future
author: Matt Butcher
description: Matt Butcher reflects on how things started, how Kubernetes marched to maturity, and how it displayed potential to expand into the WebAssembly movement.
cntitle: Kubernetes 十年：过去、现在和未来
cndescription: Matt Butcher 回顾了事情的开端、Kubernetes 如何走向成熟，以及它如何展示了扩展到 WebAssembly 运动的潜力。
